findings.issue: Claims threats are "Limited to a One Planet Civilisation" but then mentions they could spread to space

findings.quote: If alien-induced galactic x-risks have a non-zero probability
findings.issue: Contradicts line 70 which already concluded probability is "very high", not just "non-zero"

findings.quote: From hereon I will assume we are the only intelligent life
findings.issue: Abrupt assumption after arguing aliens make long-term future impossible, with no justification

findings.quote: Societal collapse or loss of value | 10% | ‚ùå
findings.issue: Gives only 10% chance of possibility despite civilizations having collapsed throughout history

findings.quote: I've included the prevention of astronomical suffering

findings.quote: interstellar missions may come before aligned superintelligence
findings.issue: Contradicts own argument that superintelligence is needed before interstellar expansion

findings.quote: Don't worry too much about the categories/subheadings here

findings.quote: defined here as an event capable of destroying the long-term potential

findings.quote: destructive capabilities have always been more powerful than defensive
findings.issue: Overgeneralization contradicted by historical examples of successful defense
